overview: Falcon Exclusive Tom Chase headlines a cast that includes Falcon Superstar Dean Spencer and Superstuds Carl Erik, Todd Stevens, Drew Nolan, Steve Ryder, Mike Nichols and Matt Cook. No matter where you are, no matter where you look, there are hot men all around...hungry, horny and itchin' for the chance to suck, fuck and eat you to ecstasy.
title: Cruisin' 3
